meanings.sent1: The hospital has a special unit for preemies to receive extra care.
meanings.sent2: The preemies were tiny but fought bravely to grow stronger.
meanings.sent3: The preemies had a race to see who could reach the milk bottle first.
meanings.sent4: The love and dedication of the nurses helped the preemies blossom into healthy babies.
meanings.sent5: The parents' hearts swelled with pride as they watched their preemies thrive.

meanings.definition: Preemies: the plural form of preemie, referring to multiple premature babies.
meanings.sent1: The neonatal ward is filled with preemies who need round-the-clock care.
meanings.sent2: The preemies' parents were overjoyed when they finally got to take them home.
meanings.sent3: The preemies giggled together in their cribs, forming a bond from day one.
meanings.sent4: The hospital staff worked tirelessly to ensure the preemies had the best chance at a healthy life.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to support the families of the preemies during their time in the hospital.
